nodes.bodyText: Should this require a new api.txt?  If so the bot did not warn me for the Database PR...
Unsure, Would it not fail tests/RC confirmation if that was the case?
It should. Seems like the bot failed silently. See #1692

I think I can add a fix for that here:
#1690
I don't think there will be a database release before that is resolved.
@samtstern I'll change the base branch of my PR to the base branch of #1690

would it be possible to get a named variable for these nulls? Its unclear what exactly they mean for the test?
Something like "NO_CALLBACK" or something.
Is there any value to holding this reference? Or is it only useful for this URL?
Yeah we don't need it after we use it.
